languages.text: Сей славный клинок скован из обломков Верхновного колокола святого мира Падувиан, чей грозный глас возглашал непримиримое рвение правденых, но умолк, когда презренные псы Уралона Жестокого предали Падувиан огню.

This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.
languages.original_text: Сей славный клинок скован из обломков Верхновного колокола святого мира Падувиан, чей грозный глас возглашал непримиримое рвение правденых, но умолк, когда презренные псы Уралона Жестокого предали Падувиан огню.

traits.locale_text: This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice shouted the implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

languages.text: 这把圣剑由神殿世界帕杜维安的古旧大钟重新锻造而成的，它的灵魂充满了无法平息的热情，会发出令人敬畏的声音。然而，当残暴者乌拉隆的爪牙将帕杜维安付之一炬时，它的声音也彻底消失了。
languages.original_text: This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

traits.locale_text: 这把圣剑由神殿世界帕杜维安的古旧大钟重新锻造而成的，它的灵魂充满了无法平息的热情，会发出令人敬畏的声音。然而，当残暴者乌拉隆的爪牙将帕杜维安付之一炬时，它的声音也彻底消失了。

languages.text: この栄光の剣は、礼拝惑星のパドヴィアンの大鐘の残骸から鍛造されたものである。その恐るべき声は容赦ない熱意をもって鳴り響いていたが、残酷なウラロンの下劣な犬たちがパドヴィアンを炎に捧げた時に鳴りを潜めた。
languages.original_text: This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

traits.locale_text: この栄光の剣は、礼拝惑星のパドヴィアンの大鐘の残骸から鍛造されたものである。その恐るべき声は容赦ない熱意をもって鳴り響いていたが、残酷なウラロンの下劣な犬たちがパドヴィアンを炎に捧げた時に鳴りを潜めた。

languages.text: Esta gloriosa hoja fue forjada de la Gran Campana del mundo santuario Paduvian, cuya formidable voz tañía con fervor implacable hasta que fue silenciada cuando los perros blasfemos al servicio de Uralon el Cruel incineraron Paduvian.
languages.original_text: This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

traits.locale_text: Esta gloriosa hoja fue forjada de la Gran Campana del mundo santuario Paduvian, cuya formidable voz tañía con fervor implacable hasta que fue silenciada cuando los perros blasfemos al servicio de Uralon el Cruel incineraron Paduvian.

languages.text: Cette lame glorieuse a été forgée à partir des débris de la grande cloche du monde sanctuaire de Paduvian, dont la voix puissante résonnait avec un zèle implacable jusqu'au jour où les chiens d'Uralon le Cruel livrèrent le monde aux flammes.
languages.original_text: This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

traits.locale_text: Cette lame glorieuse a été forgée à partir des débris de la grande cloche du monde-sanctuaire de Paduvian, dont la voix puissante résonnait avec un zèle implacable jusqu'au jour où les chiens d'Uralon le Cruel livrèrent le monde aux flammes.

languages.text: Diese großartige Klinge wurde aus den Überresten der Großen Glocke von der Schreinwelt Paduvian geschmiedet. Ihre mächtige Stimme erschallte mit unzähmbaren Eifer, wurde aber zum Schweigen gebracht, als die gemeinen Hunde von Uralon dem Grausamen Paduvian in Flammen setzten.
languages.original_text: This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

traits.locale_text: Diese großartige Klinge wurde aus den Überresten der Großen Glocke von der Schreinwelt Paduvian geschmiedet. Ihre mächtige Stimme erschallte mit unzähmbaren Eifer, wurde aber zum Schweigen gebracht, als die gemeinen Hunde von Uralon dem Grausamen Paduvian in Flammen setzten.

languages.text: Bu görkemli kılıç, mabet dünya Paduvian'ın Büyük Çanı'nın enkazından dövülmüştür. Tüyleri diken diken eden sesi bastırılamaz bir himmetle çınlamış ancak Zalim Uralon'un aşağılık köpeklerinin Paduvian'ı ateşe vermesiyle sessizliğe gömülmüştür.
languages.original_text: This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.
